bibl.title: The Earthly Monastery and the Transformation of the Heavenly City in Late Antique Egypt.
Heavenly Realms and Earthly Realities in Late Antique Religions
bibl.author: COPELAND, Kristi B.

bibl.note: The Apocalypse of Paul (a product of late fourth-century Egypt) reflects attitudes prevalent among late antique Egyptian Christians and pilgrims to Egypt, who regarded the monastery as a new model for the heavenly Jerusalem.
COPELAND Kristi B., The Earthly Monastery and the Transformation of the Heavenly City in Late Antique Egypt.
Ra'anan S. BOUSTAN and Annette Yoshido REED (Edd.), Heavenly Realms and Earthly Realities in Late Antique Religions (Cambridge, 2004) pp. 142-158.
